mapper.select: select cav_id, order_time, customer, cav_by, cav_type, this_money, founder, found_time, remarks, approver, approval_state, approval_remarks, last_approval_time, update_time from frameproject.capital_cav_cia where cav_id = #{cavId}

select cav_id, order_time, customer, cav_by, cav_type, this_money, founder, found_time, remarks, approver, approval_state, approval_remarks, last_approval_time, update_time from frameproject.capital_cav_cia limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into frameproject.capital_cav_cia(order_time, customer, cav_by, cav_type, this_money, founder, found_time, remarks, approver, approval_state, approval_remarks, last_approval_time, update_time) values (#{orderTime}, #{customer}, #{cavBy}, #{cavType}, #{thisMoney}, #{founder}, #{foundTime}, #{remarks}, #{approver}, #{approvalState}, #{approvalRemarks}, #{lastApprovalTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into frameproject.capital_cav_cia(order_time, customer, cav_by, cav_type, this_money, founder, found_time, remarks, approver, approval_state, approval_remarks, last_approval_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.orderTime}, #{entity.customer}, #{entity.cavBy}, #{entity.cavType}, #{entity.thisMoney}, #{entity.founder}, #{entity.foundTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.approver}, #{entity.approvalState}, #{entity.approvalRemarks}, #{entity.lastApprovalTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into frameproject.capital_cav_cia(order_time, customer, cav_by, cav_type, this_money, founder, found_time, remarks, approver, approval_state, approval_remarks, last_approval_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.orderTime}, #{entity.customer}, #{entity.cavBy}, #{entity.cavType}, #{entity.thisMoney}, #{entity.founder}, #{entity.foundTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.approver}, #{entity.approvalState}, #{entity.approvalRemarks}, #{entity.lastApprovalTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update order_time = values(order_time) , customer = values(customer) , cav_by = values(cav_by) , cav_type = values(cav_type) , this_money = values(this_money) , founder = values(founder) , found_time = values(found_time) , remarks = values(remarks) , approver = values(approver) , approval_state = values(approval_state) , approval_remarks = values(approval_remarks) , last_approval_time = values(last_approval_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update frameproject.capital_cav_cia
order_time = #{orderTime},
customer = #{customer},
cav_by = #{cavBy},
cav_type = #{cavType},
this_money = #{thisMoney},
founder = #{founder},
found_time = #{foundTime},
remarks = #{remarks},
approver = #{approver},
approval_state = #{approvalState},
approval_remarks = #{approvalRemarks},
last_approval_time = #{lastApprovalTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where cav_id = #{cavId}
